snippet: An independent filmmaker and a personal trainer partnered up to start a company whose message is that it’s not what you eat that matters, but how much.
abstract: Nicole LaPorte Prototype column notes that personal trainer Steven Kates and independent filmmaker Myles Berkowitz teamed up to found Lifesize, a weight-loss company that advocates a portion-control diet system that uses plastic measuring devices for food groups like carbohydrates, meats and dairy.
lead_paragraph: An independent filmmaker and a personal trainer partnered up to start a company whose message is that it’s not what you eat that matters, but how much.
